main.description: Combination of computational and experimental methods for the development of novel molecular systems and chemical reactions.
main.university: We work on the basis of universities:

education.chemicalCourses: Online course on chemical reaction modeling

aboutDesc.heading: SCIENTIFIC GROUP
aboutDesc.text: In our group, we focus on the development of computational methods and general strategies for the design and optimization of molecular tools and processes.

aboutResearch.heading: Researchers
aboutResearch.addition: We also apply these methodologies to develop new molecular and biomolecular systems for use in biomedical research and pharmacology.

researchers.name: RYAZANTSEV MIKHAIL NIKOLAEVICH
researchers.profession: Head of the scientific group, PHD, Associate Professor
